summary: A filmed account of the Zaire 74 soul music festival, originally intended to be in concert with the famous Rumble in the Jungle bout in Kinshasa, Zaire in 1974.
cast: Afrisa|Muhammad Ali|Fania All-Stars|Buddy Allen|Ray Barretto|Big Black|Keith Bradshaw|Kent Leon Brinkley|Drew Bundini Brown|James Brown|David Butts|Larry Carlton|Stokely Carmichael|Stix Cooper|The Crusaders|Celia Cruz|Manu Dibango|Loko Massengo Djeskain|Henry Fambrough|Wilton Felder|Franco|Leon Gast|Lynn Goldsmith|Bill Henderson|Wayne Henderson|The Mighty J.B.'s|Pervis Jackson|Ok Jazz|B.B. King|Don King|Norman Leigh|Stewart Levine|Tabu Ley|Lola Love|Lukuku|Franco Luombo|Mario Matadidi Mabele|Trio Madjesi|Miriam Makeba|Francois Luambo Makiadi|Nicky Marrero|Hugh Masekela|Bill McManus|Johnny Pacheco|Alan Pariser|Maceo Parker|George Plimpton|Lloyd Price|Danny 'Big Black' Rey|Tabu Ley Rochereau|Saak Sinatra Sakoul|Joe Sample|Sweet Charles Sherrill|Sister Sledge|Debbie Sledge|Joni Sledge|Kathy Sledge|Kim Sledge|Bobbie Smith|The Spinners|Tomo Toro|Pembe Dance Troupe|Fred Wesley|Bill Withers|Philippé Wynne
title: Soul Power
